description: eCommerce site of flower shop in the center of Manhattan. There you can find a lot of beautifyl flower kits and order it at any city of USA.
This is the promo site for Evropribor company. Which provides information about it's products, services and benefits. Either you can find there map with the office locations and contact info.

The idea was to create the order configurator for techniqual equipment: pressure gauges, depth probes and etc. You should pick the type or/and model of equipment, then it's characteristeics ony by one. And in the final step you can print order code.

The project provides an opportunity to get your website and mobile application based on the aggregator. This is convenient, since the FoodPicasso development team is responsible for maintaining the site.

The flagship website of a real estate company. The site presents a large number of services and filters for choosing the best option for buying a home. The site also contains a lot of useful information that will help the client make the most profitable deal for him.

The site is intended for news of the city of Grodno, advertising of various individual entrepreneurs. The site also contains various useful articles. The site has a multifunctional control panel where a registered user who is a client of the site can manage his advertising, view statistics, and conduct transactions with buyers.
